attestation_standard: SICA Constitution S3.1 Tier 3 -- Three-Chain Blockchain Registry

bitcoin.notes: Verify with ots-cli: ots verify master-index.json.ots

ethereum.transaction_hash: PENDING -- paste tx hash after MetaMask submission
ethereum.notes: Send 0 ETH to own address with hex_data as input. Decodes to attestation_string.

arweave.transaction_id: PENDING -- paste Arweave tx ID after upload
arweave.data_description: Full MW Canon v2.0.0 -- 39 documents + verification files
arweave.permanence: permanent -- Arweave stores data forever for one-time fee

verification_instructions.bitcoin: Download master-index.json.ots. Install ots-cli (pip install opentimestamps-client). Run: ots verify master-index.json.ots
verification_instructions.ethereum: Visit the explorer_url. Click 'Input Data'. Decode as UTF-8. Verify the SHA3-512 hash matches attested_hash.
verification_instructions.arweave: Visit manifest_url. All 39 documents + verification files are permanently stored. Compute SHA3-512 and compare.

quorum_rule: 2 of 3 chains must confirm for attestation to be valid per SICA S3.1.
